name: Police Brutality
description:
This illustration is representation the phenomenon of evictions taking over the residential land of the Tamansari RW 11 community Bandung in December 2019 which is considered by the local government to be unofficial for habitation.

Basic work using Chinese ink on paper and then working through digital media.
Infinite Loop Animation
IMAGE/GIF
1085 X 1536 PX
